price: Hawataonja humo chochote kibaridi wala kinywaji,
arabic: لَّا يَذُوقُونَ فِيهَا بَرۡدٗا وَلَا شَرَابًا
footnotes: Hawataonja humo hata chembe ya upepo wa kuburudisha joto lake, wala kinywaji cha kupoza kiu chao.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: lā yadhūqūna fīhā bardan walā sharāban
